summary: The module defines a class that implements a simple HTTP server for handling GET and HEAD requests, forwarding them to a user-defined callback function. It also defines a platform class that manages the lifecycle of a MagicMirror device, handling media control, status signaling, heartbeat monitoring, and external HTTP interactions.
business_intent: To enable integration of a MagicMirror device with the Alexa API, allowing external control and monitoring via HTTP requests and providing status updates and media playback capabilities.
